title: FPS and Ping fine but Game not responding
body:
Hello,

When I play, at least once or twice per game, I have these 1-2 seconds where my game is not responding to anything I do. My fps is fine and my ping seems fine, I can see the enemies and allies do whatever they want (most likely killing me) but whatever spell key or mouse key I press nothing happens. This last for 1-2 seconds and then it responds normally. I don't really know what to do to fix that.
This has first appeared after I got a new laptop.

Thanks for any guess on how to fix the problem.

replies.body:
Here it is, https://ibb.co/fLHKGF

Indeed I have a 2.91% packet loss which seems pretty high.
Gonna try using ethernet rather than Wi-Fi to see if it's better,
Thanks for the help.

Anytime it looks like your champion is 'rubberbanding' or just plain ignoring your commands while everything else acts normally, there's a good chance you're having packet loss issues. Essentially packet loss is when bits of the data is lost between your network and our servers. 

Check out our [**Log Reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and throw your most recent game logs (where you had these issues) into it to read. Take a screenshot of what it says and link it here for me!
